list.listitem: Gustave Eiffel(18321923), engineer and designer of the Eiffel Tower and the Statue of LibertyEiffel Tower, in Paris, France, designed by Gustave EiffelEiffel (company), successor of Gustave Eiffel's engineering company
Eiffel 65, an electronic music group, originally called Eiffel
Eiffel (programming language), developed by Bertrand Meyer
"Alec Eiffel", a song by the alternative rock band Pixies
Eiffel Bridge, Ungheni, Moldova, designed by Gustave Eiffel
Eiffel Bridge, Zrenjanin, Serbia, built by Gustave Eiffel's company
Erika Eiffel, American woman who "married" the Eiffel Tower
Jean Effel(19081982), French painter, caricaturist, illustrator and journalist
